amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Procurement, Defense-Wide, $20,000,000 for procurement of secure cellular telephones for the Department of Defense and the elements of the intelligence community.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1301 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1301 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S9566-9569; text: CR S9566) To make available from amounts available for Procurement, Defense-Wide, $20,000,000 for procurement of secure cellular telephones for the Department of Defense and the elements of the intelligence community.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1301 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1301 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
